alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 4:40AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of western Collier County through 515 AM EDT... At 440 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a gusty shower capable of producing a funnel cloud over Naples Manor, or near Naples, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Naples, Golden Gate Estates, Belle Meade, Orangetree, Naples Manor, Golden Gate, East Naples, Lely Resort, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Vineyards, North Naples, Naples Park, Pelican Bay, Lely, Rookery Bay Aquatic Preserve, Quail Creek Estate, and Fiddlers Creek. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.
